TopicTitle: Hey guys, I thought to introduce my little KSP series to you: KNews!

Articles.Content:
I plan to put this out regulary and get also more self made animations in the video. I'm currently busy learning how to use blender properly for that matter. Just so you know: I slowly transistion from KerbalNews to KNews because I saw a guy who is allready called KerbalNews and I don't want to steal his name! The logo still says KerbalNews however, sorry about that. Please feel free to criticise and thanks for your time! 

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/xQLn6xLeoHc?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
